ipmisc 2.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Reference

Data wrangling functions

set_cwd()

Setting Working Directory in RStudio to where the R Script is.

long_to_wide_converter()

Converts long-format dataframe to wide-format dataframe

outlier_df()

Adding a column to dataframe describing outlier status

signif_column()

Creating a new column with significance labels

specify_decimal_p()

Formatting numeric (p-)values

sort_xy()

Sorting y column in data by x.

stats_type_switch()

Switch type of statistics.

Helper functions (messages)

Simple function to display messages from tests carried out to check statistical assumptions of tests.

bartlett_message()

Display homogeneity of variance test as a message

normality_message()

Display normality test result as a message.

Reexported functions

Useful functions re-exported from other packages.

reexports

Objects exported from other packages

Miscellaneous functions

set_cwd()

Setting Working Directory in RStudio to where the R Script is.

Data

Datasets included in the package.

movies_wide

Movie information and user ratings from IMDB.com (wide format).

movies_long

Movie information and user ratings from IMDB.com (long format).

bugs_long

Tidy version of the "Bugs" dataset.

iris_long

Edgar Anderson's Iris Data in long format.
